name: Dualitereum Rush
description: Are you a boring person in real life or a colorless person? No problem, you can be both boring and colorful in Metaverse. You are a Metaverse investment expert who has invested $5 in Dualitereum coin and believes you will become a millionaire. Your goal in the game is to overcome the obstacles on the platform by following the instant changes in the money you deposit. Sometimes you want to add profit to your profit by buying NFT and sometimes by buying virtual lands. Just be careful, the balloon may come out. You have to overcome some obstacles by going to the Metaverse world and some others in the real world, but you must pay attention to time. After all, investment does not wait.
